title: Build full Gambia Market interactive blueprint app

requirements.text: Implement a Phone Number Registration with OTP feature section: display a realistic UI mockup or detailed description card showing the registration flow — enter phone number, receive OTP via SMS, verify code, and complete profile setup. Include the step-by-step flow with form fields (phone input, OTP input, name, location) and validation states.

quotes: Phone number registration with OTP via SMS

acceptanceCriteria: Registration flow is visually represented with phone input, OTP verification, and profile setup steps
Each step shows relevant form fields and validation feedback
Component renders from structured data in the existing TypeScript data files

requirements.text: Implement a Listing Creation feature showcase card: display a detailed walkthrough of the listing creation flow including photo upload (multi-image), category selector, price input, condition selector (new/used/refurbished), and location tagging. Show this as an illustrated step-by-step card or mini-form mockup within the Feature Breakdown section.

quotes: Listing creation with photos, category, price, condition, and location tagging

acceptanceCriteria: Listing creation steps are shown: photo upload, category, price, condition, location
Visual representation includes relevant field types (file picker, dropdown, number input, etc.)
Integrates consistently with existing FeatureCard styling and theme

requirements.text: Implement a Home Feed feature showcase: display a visual representation of the home feed showing nearby listings sorted by distance or region. Include a mock listing grid/list with sample listing cards (image, title, price, location badge, distance indicator) that illustrates the feed experience for Gambian users.

quotes: Home feed with nearby listings sorted by distance or region

acceptanceCriteria: Home feed mockup shows at least 3–4 sample listing cards
Each listing card includes image placeholder, title, price, and location/distance badge
Layout demonstrates responsive grid or list arrangement

requirements.text: Implement a Search & Filters feature showcase: display an interactive-looking search bar mockup and filter panel showing category dropdown, price range slider/inputs, and condition checkboxes. Present this as a visual demo card within the Feature Breakdown section, illustrating how users would search and narrow down listings.

quotes: Search bar and category, price, and condition filters

acceptanceCriteria: Search bar mockup is displayed with placeholder text
Filter options shown: category, price range, and condition
Visual demo is styled consistently with the app's African market theme

requirements.text: Implement an In-App Chat feature showcase: display a visual mockup of the real-time chat interface between buyer and seller, showing a conversation thread with message bubbles, listing context (thumbnail and title at top), timestamp display, and a message input bar. Include sample messages illustrating a buyer inquiry and seller response.

quotes: In-app real-time chat between buyer and seller

acceptanceCriteria: Chat mockup shows at least 3 sample messages alternating between buyer and seller
Listing context header is shown at top of chat
Message input bar with send button is displayed
Styled consistently with the warm African market theme

requirements.text: Implement a Verified Seller Badge feature showcase: display a detailed explanation card showing the badge verification process — ID upload step, review period, badge awarded state — alongside a visual example of a seller profile card showing the verified badge, star rating, and number of completed transactions.

quotes: Verified seller badge system with ID upload

acceptanceCriteria: Verification steps (upload ID, review, badge awarded) are shown
Sample seller profile card with verified badge is displayed
Badge uses a visually distinct gold or green checkmark icon consistent with the theme

requirements.text: Implement a Delivery & Meet-Up feature showcase: display a card illustrating the two fulfillment options — (1) Delivery Request with address input, estimated cost, and delivery partner selection, and (2) Meet-Up arrangement with proposed location and time. Show these as a side-by-side comparison card with icons and brief descriptions for each option.

quotes: Delivery request and meet-up arrangement options

acceptanceCriteria: Both delivery and meet-up options are shown side by side
Each option includes an icon, title, and description
Visual layout is consistent with existing FeatureCard components

requirements.text: Implement a Mobile Money Payments feature showcase: display a payment flow card showing the three payment methods — Afrimoney, QMoney, and Cash on Delivery. Include a mock payment selection screen with radio buttons or payment method cards, a confirmation step, and status badges (pending, completed). Show the Afrimoney and QMoney logos as styled text badges.

quotes: Mobile money payments via Afrimoney and QMoney plus cash on delivery

acceptanceCriteria: All three payment methods (Afrimoney, QMoney, Cash on Delivery) are displayed
Payment selection UI mockup is shown
Transaction status badges (pending, completed) are included
Styled with the app's warm green and gold theme

requirements.text: Implement a Trust & Safety System feature showcase: display a card illustrating the four trust mechanisms — (1) star ratings with a visual 5-star selector, (2) written review with sample text, (3) report system with a reason dropdown mockup, and (4) block user confirmation dialog. Present these as a 2×2 grid of mini-cards within the feature section.

quotes: Star ratings, written reviews, report system, and block user for trust and safety

acceptanceCriteria: All four trust mechanisms are visually represented
Star rating component shows interactive-style stars
Report and block actions show confirmation UI mockups
Layout is responsive and consistent with the existing theme

requirements.text: Implement a Boosted & Promoted Listings feature showcase within the Monetization section: display a visual comparison card showing a standard listing versus a boosted listing (highlighted border, 'Sponsored' badge, top-of-feed position indicator). Include a pricing tier card showing boosting options (e.g., 3-day, 7-day, 30-day boost with example prices in GMD). Mark this as the primary revenue driver with a distinct highlight.

quotes: Boosted and promoted listings as primary monetization feature

acceptanceCriteria: Side-by-side comparison of standard vs boosted listing is shown
Boosted listing has a 'Sponsored' badge and highlighted styling
Pricing tiers for boosting are displayed with example GMD amounts
Section is marked as the primary monetization driver with visual emphasis

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/
All new feature showcase content must be stored as structured TypeScript data in frontend/src/data/ files and rendered dynamically
Maintain the existing West African textile-inspired color palette and kente/batik motif styling
All new components must be consistent with existing component patterns (SectionContainer, FeatureCard, etc.)
nonGoals: Do not implement actual backend logic for registration, chat, payments, or any functional app features
Do not add a real database or authentication system
Do not change the backend Motoko actor
Do not implement real-time functionality — all content is static/presentational

required: Gambia Market mobile app screen mockup showing a home feed with colorful product listing cards in a warm green and gold UI on a smartphone frame (app-screen-mockup.dim_800x600.png)
Mobile money payment screen illustration showing Afrimoney and QMoney logos with a payment confirmation UI in warm earthy tones (payment-methods-illustration.dim_600x400.png)
